title: SMNTCConfig
description: Configuration schema for the SMNTC semantic shader engine. Describes *intent* — the engine resolves it to GPU instructions.

surface.description: Visual displacement pattern. topographic = contour lines (sine), crystalline = faceted clusters (Voronoi), fluid = organic flow (Simplex), glitch = quantized random, organic = domain-warped biological membrane, terrain = ridged multi-fractal landscape, plasma = swirling energy FBM, wave = Gerstner ocean waves.

vibe.description: Motion character. stable = near-static breathing, calm = slow rhythmic, agitated = high-frequency erratic, chaotic = stochastic bursts, breathing = ultra-slow meditation, pulse = beat-synchronized, drift = languid horizontal, storm = violent turbulence, cinematic = dramatic slow-motion.

reactivity.description: Cursor interaction model. static = none, magnetic = pull toward cursor, repel = push away, shockwave = click triggers radial ripple.

fidelity.description: Geometry density. low = 64×64 (mobile), medium = 128×128, high = 256×256 (desktop), ultra = 512×512 (presentation).

palette.description: Color scheme. monochrome = white/black, ember = warm orange, arctic = cool blue, neon = green/magenta, phantom = grey-purple, ocean = deep blue/teal, sunset = orange-to-purple, matrix = green terminal, vapor = pink/cyan vaporwave, gold = luxury gold, infrared = thermal red/orange, aurora = northern lights green/purple, midnight = navy/silver.

wireframe.description: Render as wireframe (true) or solid fill (false).

intensity.description: Global amplitude multiplier for vertex displacement.

speed.description: Global speed multiplier for animation playback.

contourLines.description: Contour line count. Only affects surface: 'topographic'.

thermalGuard.description: Auto-pause animation when the browser tab is hidden to save battery.

angle.description: Displacement rotation angle in degrees. Rotates the noise sampling direction.

grain.description: Film grain overlay intensity (After Effects-style noise). 0 = none, 1 = heavy grain.

glow.description: Bloom/glow emulation intensity (After Effects Glow effect). 0 = none, 2 = extreme.

chromatic.description: Chromatic aberration strength (Premiere Pro lens distortion). 0 = none, 1 = heavy.

vignette.description: Edge darkening vignette (cinema lens effect). 0 = none, 1 = heavy darkening.

blur.description: Depth-of-field blur simulation. 0 = sharp, 1 = heavy blur at edges.
